title: Teravail’s New Tires and Wheels
content:
Teravail makes some of our favorite tires for everything from gravel roads to chunky gravel, downcountry, and techy trail riding. The tire manufacturer just announced four new models of tires along with a rim and wheel system…

In addition to the Fluent carbon MTB rims ($499) and wheels ($1398 wheelset), the three new tires are outlined below.

Camrock delivers straight-line speed and smoothness on XC terrain. It features a low-profile, evenly spaced, and linear tread pattern with sharp lug edges.

  • 29 x 2.4″
  • Tubeless-ready casing prevents flats, boosts traction and comfort at low pressure
  • Fast compound provides low resistance for a fast-rolling tire
  • Light Trail casing features a 1.5-ply, 120 TPI casing that conforms to the trail and saves weight, plus bead-to-bead puncture protection.
    • Price (available in both black & tan wall options): $80 US/$115 CAN
    • Weight: 710g
  • Durable casing features a 1.5-ply, 60 TPI casing to protect against trail abrasion and sharp rocks
    • Price (available in both black & tan wall options): $80 US/$115 CAN
    • Weight: 795g

Drawpoint delivers control and straight-line speed on progressive terrain. It features fast-rolling center lugs and elevated shoulder lugs.

  • 29 x 2.4″
  • Tubeless-ready casing prevents flats, boosts traction and comfort at low pressures
  • Grip compound provides high traction for a stable, predictable ride
  • Light Trail casing features a 1.5-ply, 120 TPI casing that conforms to the trail and saves weight, plus bead-to-bead puncture protection
    • Price (available in both black & tan wall options): $80 USD/$115 CAN
    • Weight: 825g
  • Durable casing features a 1.5-ply, 60 TPI casing to protect against trail abrasion and sharp rocks
    • Price (available in both black & tan wall options): $80 USD/$115 CAN
    • Weight: 910g

Clifty delivers balanced performance in all-mountain and unpredictable terrain. It features uniform lug sizing and spacing to maximize trail contact.

  • 29 x 2.5″
  • Tubeless-ready casing
  • Available in our Grip or Grip Plus rubber compound
  • Durable casing features a 1.5-ply, 60 TPI casing to protect against trail abrasion and sharp rocks
    • Price (available in both black & tan wall options): $80 USD/$115 CAN
    • Weight: 1020g
  • Durable Plus casing features a two-ply, 120 TPI casing that defends against punctures and cuts, and an apex wedge for more impact protection 
    • Price (available in both black & tan wall options): $85 USD/$120 CAN
    • Weight: 1220g

Fluent is Teravail’s new carbon MTB rim, optimized for Teravail MTB tires to deliver the best possible connection to the trail.

  • Lifetime warranty
  • 450 grams
  • 30mm internal width
  • Front- and rear-optimized rim drilling for better spoke bracing angles
  • Hookless design with thick flange for durability
  • 28- and 32-hole options
    • Rim Only pricing (28- or 32-hole options, front or rear): $499 USD/$710 CAN
  • Available as a complete wheelset with DT Swiss 350 hubs, or as a rim-only for custom wheel builds
  • Complete Fluent wheels are hand-built at our warehouse in Minnesota
    • Fluent wheel pricing
      • Fluent Front Wheel, 29″, 6-bolt, 28h drilling: $599 USD/$850 CAN
      • Fluent Rear Wheel, 29″, XD, 6-bolt, 28h drilling: $799 USD/$1,135 CAN

 

Check out the new Teravail MTB lineup at your local dealer.
